summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3079, for the improvement of Mount Claire Drive, from Shoreland Drive to Mt. Baker Drive, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37355 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
